title: What are some good books written by less-known authors? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some Good Books by Lesser Known Authors: FoolProof - by Greg IP - an exciting book on Risk ManagementFooled by Randomness - Nasim Nicholas Talib - Understanding Stock MarketsFinance for Non-Finance - Vishal Thakkar :)Let me know if you are looking for any specific domain.
